title: Figuring It Out
description: After making peace with Austin and everything that happened between them, Mia finds herself back in the world of high-level ice dancing she thought she'd left behind for good. It's an incredible opportunity and she doesn't want to do anything to mess it up, including getting involved with the one man she's never been able to resist.When fate throws another twist their way, she's faced with a choice she never thought she'd have to make. Is there still a chance for all her dreams to come true, on and off the ice?Will Mia manage to get the happy ending that Amy never did? When she's given the choice, which life will she choose?
author: Melody Tyden
